name: Res furtiva
description:
My entry for Seven-Day Roguelike Challenge 2020.

It's time of war and occupation. The country you owe so much to has been invaded by a union of countries called G.M.E.T. You're a part of underground state movement. Due to your diffcult past, you're specialized in burglary and theft.

The gameplay is supposed to introduce Thief and Commandos feel to roguelikes.

You play a sequence of missions in procedurally generated areas like mansions, military camps, streets. The missions will mostly be about stealing and sabotage. Sneaking will be important because the player will be weak comparing to his enemies.
Made with precious help of Settegren (music), Daniel Moroz (some art) and Bartosz Cybulski (testing), as well as invaluable open resources. namely DawnLike, LPC and Calciumtrice Dungeon tilesets, Cakar Monyet font and jfxr.frozenfractal.com sound generator.

As always since 2018, used Osnowa framewok.
